scripts.refresh-collectors: npm run remove-test-collectors && npm run copy-test-collectors
scripts.copy-test-collectors: cp -R collectorCore testing/components & cp -R nativePlayerCollector testing/components & cp -R bitmovinPlayerCollector testing/components
scripts.run-tests: rooibos-cli r testing/source/tests/rooibos/testConfig.json && cd testing && make test -e ROKU_DEV_TARGET=YOUR_DEVICE_IP_HERE DEVPASSWORD=YOUR_DEV_PASSWORD_HERE
